attributes.action: Cancel United Kingdom if the government implements European court of laws advice
attributes.additional_details: Like many British people the decision to leave EU has soured this country by constant moaning and bickering by the minority who won’t be satisfied until they basically get their own way.  If so and the decision is revered by the government and European court then the United Kingdom can no longer be implemented as the minority would have the vote not the majority.
attributes.background: If the majority vote of the people  to leave the EU is reversed via European court of law advocate general, in my opinion would be biased, sort by the British government and advisors then we can no longer describe our beloved country as “ United Kingdom”

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/224908
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/226071
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/221747
